title: TCL launches a new batch of Google TVs in Europe, but still with Android 11 [Update: Pricing]
content:
As Google’s efforts on the TV expand, new devices are launching with Android TV and Google TV. This week, TCL has announced a new batch of 2022 Google TV models destined for the European market, but unfortunately, they don’t deliver Android 12.

more…

The post TCL launches a new batch of Google TVs in Europe, but still with Android 11 [Update: Pricing] appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: TCL has just refreshed its 2022 lineup of Google TV models in Europe, offering a preview of what should come to the US this year.
